Topic.Title: Scrolling is not enough on smartphones after img tags.

Posts.EditableText:
Hi, my name is YoyogiJotaro.
First of all, thank you for this splendid and easy tool of textadventures.
I have a request.
We can display jpg, png and gif by using img tags.
But on a smartphone like iPhone, the scrolling is not enough after images.
The choices text does not appear without human finger scrolling.
What can I do?
Please teach me.

notice:
PC has no problem.

Posts.EditableText: This is by design. Squiffy doesn't scroll new text or images beyond the top of the screen. It's annoying for players to have to scroll back to see what they missed.
